name: Spotify Discover Weekly Sync
description: Automatically sync your Spotify Discovery Weekly playlist to Google Play Music

SPOTIFY_CLIENT_ID.description: Spotify API Client ID (First three steps from https://developer.spotify.com/web-api/tutorial/)

SPOTIFY_CLIENT_SECRET.description: Spotify API Client Secret (First three steps from https://developer.spotify.com/web-api/tutorial/)

GPM_EMAIL_ADDRESS.description: The email address used to log into GPM

GPM_APP_PASSWORD.description: A Google App Password generated for use by this program (https://support.google.com/accounts/answer/185833?hl=en)
